From: Lawrence Paulson <lp15@cam.ac.uk>
I'm sorry about the spam message that just went out on our mailing list. It escaped moderation because it came from a list subscriber. As of today, a former list subscriber. If necessary, it is even possible to block somebody from resubscribing.

I'm sure that none of our remaining subscribers would dream of behaving so inconsiderately.

Larry
